data.title: Film dialogue
data.meta_description: Independent British cinema has been richly enhanced by the talents of veteran Oscar-winning producer Jeremy Thomas and darkly humorous auteur director Ben…
data.text:
We’re in the world of make-believe and stardust for this month’s Conversation, meeting two of the most exciting exponents of the British and international film industries, one with 35 years experience, one a young(ish) buck on the rise.

Jeremy Thomas’s Recorded Picture Company has produced films famous and notorious across all genres: from the Sex Pistols mockumentary The Great Rock’n’ Roll Swindle to the hypnotic Japanese prisoner-of-war tale Merry Christmas, Mr Lawrence via Jonathan Glazer’s maverick masterpiece Sexy Beast and Bernardo Bertolu…
